languages.text: В рваных бороздах на перегородке застряли ошметки кожи и обломки ногтей и зубов. Кто-то неистово пытался нацарапать богохульный символ, не жалея себя.

traits.locale_text: В рваных бороздах на перегородке застряли ошметки кожи и обломки ногтей и зубов. Кто-то неистово пытался нацарапать богохульный символ, не жалея себя.

languages.text: Scraps of skin and broken nails and teeth are stuck in the ragged grooves on the bulkhead — someone made a frenzied attempt to scratch the blasphemous symbol into the metal, showing themselves no mercy.
languages.original_text: В рваных бороздах на перегородке застряли ошметки кожи и обломки ногтей и зубов. Кто-то неистово пытался нацарапать богохульный символ, не жалея себя.

traits.locale_text: Scraps of skin and broken nails and teeth are stuck in the ragged grooves on the bulkhead — someone made a frenzied attempt to scratch the blasphemous symbol into the metal, showing themselves no mercy.
A symbol scratched on the bulkhead.

Scraps of skin and broken nails and teeth are stuck in the ragged grooves on the bulkhead — someone made a frenzied attempt to scratch the blasphemous symbol into the metal, showing themselves no mercy.

languages.text: En las muescas burdas de la mampara quedan restos de piel, uñas y dientes rotos: un loco ha intentado grabar un símbolo blasfemo en el metal sin ninguna consideración hacia su propio cuerpo.
languages.original_text: Scraps of skin and broken nails and teeth are stuck in the ragged grooves on the bulkhead — someone made a frenzied attempt to scratch the blasphemous symbol into the metal, showing themselves no mercy.

traits.locale_text: Un símbolo arañado en la mampara.

languages.text: 舱壁的凹槽里嵌着皮肤碎片、断裂的指甲和牙齿。看起来，应该是某个疯子打算用自己的肉体在金属船舱上画下亵渎神明的符号，对自己毫不留情。
languages.original_text: Scraps of skin and broken nails and teeth are stuck in the ragged grooves on the bulkhead — someone made a frenzied attempt to scratch the blasphemous symbol into the metal, showing themselves no mercy.

traits.locale_text: 一个刻在舱壁上的符号。

languages.text: 隔壁のボロボロの溝に、皮膚の欠片や折れた爪、歯が挟まっている…誰かが狂ったようにどうにかしようと、金属に埋め込まれた不敬なシンボルを容赦なく引っ掻いたようだ。
languages.original_text: Scraps of skin and broken nails and teeth are stuck in the ragged grooves on the bulkhead — someone made a frenzied attempt to scratch the blasphemous symbol into the metal, showing themselves no mercy.

traits.locale_text: 隔壁のボロボロの溝に、皮膚の欠片や折れた爪、歯が挟まっている…誰かが狂ったようにどうにかしようと、金属に埋め込まれた不敬なシンボルを容赦なく引っ掻いたようだ。

languages.text: Hautfetzen, abgebrochene Fingernägel und Zähne stecken in den schartigen Rillen des Schotts ... jemand hat verzweifelt versucht, das blasphemische Symbol in das Metall zu ritzen, ohne sich selbst dabei zu schonen.
languages.original_text: Scraps of skin and broken nails and teeth are stuck in the ragged grooves on the bulkhead — someone made a frenzied attempt to scratch the blasphemous symbol into the metal, showing themselves no mercy.

traits.locale_text: Ein auf das Schott gekratztes Symbol.

languages.text: Des lambeaux de peau, des ongles arrachés et des dents cassées sont collés dans les sillons irréguliers marquant la cloison. Manifestement, on s'est donné beaucoup de mal pour graver le symbole blasphématoire sur le métal.
languages.original_text: Scraps of skin and broken nails and teeth are stuck in the ragged grooves on the bulkhead — someone made a frenzied attempt to scratch the blasphemous symbol into the metal, showing themselves no mercy.

traits.locale_text: Un symbole gravé dans la cloison.

languages.text: Deri, kırık tırnak ve diş parçaları; bölme panelinin pütürlü oluklarına sıkışmış. Birisi, kendine acımadan metalin üzerine bir kâfir sembolü kazımaya çalışmış.
languages.original_text: Scraps of skin and broken nails and teeth are stuck in the ragged grooves on the bulkhead — someone made a frenzied attempt to scratch the blasphemous symbol into the metal, showing themselves no mercy.

traits.locale_text: Deri, kırık tırnak ve diş parçaları; bölme panelinin pütürlü oluklarına sıkışmış. Birisi, kendine acımadan metalin üzerine bir kâfir sembolü kazımaya çalışmış.
